original_text: The king will deceive the people who are no longer faithful to God. He will make them help him. But the people who are still faithful to God will work hard to stop him.
korean_text: 그가 또 언약을 배반하고 악행하는 자를 속임수로 타락시킬 것이나 오직 자기의 하나님을 아는 백성은 강하여 용맹을 떨치리라

sentences.original_text: The king will deceive the people
who are no longer faithful to God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께 더 이상 충성하지 않는 자들

sentences.original_text: He will make them help him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 자기를 돕게 만들 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But the people who are still faithful to God
will work hard to stop him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 막기 위해 열심히 노력할 것입니다
